name: Use AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for CloudWatch Log Group Encryption
description: Ensure that all CloudWatch Log Groups are encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMKs) for enhanced security and control over the encryption process.

name: Configure Appropriate Retention Period for CloudWatch Log Groups
description: Set a retention period of at least 1 year for all CloudWatch Log Groups to ensure long-term storage and availability of log data for auditing, compliance, and forensic purposes.

name: Enable CloudWatch Alarm Actions
description: Ensure that all CloudWatch Alarms have their actions enabled to allow automatic notification and response to monitored events and threshold breaches.

name: Configure CloudWatch Alarm Actions for ALARM State
description: Ensure that all CloudWatch Alarms have at least one action configured for the ALARM state to enable proper notification and response to critical events.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for Unauthorized API Calls
description: Create a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to detect and alert on unauthorized API calls, enhancing security monitoring and incident response capabilities.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for AWS Management Console Authentication Failures
description: Establish a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to monitor and alert on AWS Management Console authentication failures, helping to detect potential security breaches or brute force attempts.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for IAM Policy Changes
description: Set up a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to track and notify on any changes made to IAM policies, ensuring prompt awareness of potential security policy modifications.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for Security Group Changes
description: Create a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to detect and alert on any modifications to security groups, helping to maintain network security integrity.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for Network Access Control List (NACL) Changes
description: Establish a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to monitor and notify on any changes to Network Access Control Lists (NACLs), ensuring visibility into network access modifications.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for AWS Config Configuration Changes
description: Set up a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to track and alert on any modifications to AWS Config configurations, maintaining awareness of changes to compliance and security monitoring settings.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for S3 Bucket Policy Changes
description: Create a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to detect and notify on any alterations to S3 bucket policies, ensuring prompt awareness of potential security policy modifications for S3 resources.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for AWS Organizations Changes
description: Establish a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to monitor and alert on any changes to AWS Organizations structure or policies, maintaining visibility into organizational-level modifications.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for VPC Changes
description: Set up a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to track and notify on any modifications to VPC configurations, ensuring awareness of changes to network architecture and settings.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for Route Table Changes
description: Create a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to detect and alert on any changes to route tables, helping to maintain the integrity of network routing configurations.

name: Implement Log Metric Filter and Alarm for Network Gateway Changes
description: Establish a CloudWatch log metric filter and alarm to monitor and notify on any modifications to network gateways, ensuring visibility into changes affecting network connectivity and security.
